title: Amazon Just Slashed the Price of This Ultra-Quiet Air Purifier, Now at an All-Time Low
description: With rising temperatures and increasing pollution, an air purifier has become essential for maintaining good health.

title: What a Prostate Nodule Detection Like Biden’s Can Mean for a Man’s Health
description: Some doctors say they are surprised the condition was found at all in the former president, given his age.

title: Trump’s Focus on Punishing Drug Dealers May Hurt Drug Users Trying to Quit
description: Public health and addiction experts fear millions could lose access to treatment and prevention services if the administration’s proposed cuts are enacted.

title: An L.A. Doctor’s House Burned. Now He Treats the Fires’ Effects in Neighbors.
description: A new clinic, opened by a pulmonologist who lost his home in the Palisades blaze, is addressing the health issues developing among people exposed to the fires.

title: With No Real Policy, Trump Asks Drugmakers to Lower U.S. Prices
description: The president has long complained that the United States pays more for medicines than other wealthy countries. But he offered no clear legal authority to mandate lower prices.

title: Trump Plan Would Tie Some Drug Prices to What Peer Nations Pay
description: The president announced an executive order aimed at lowering U.S. drug costs, revisiting an idea that was blocked in court during his first term.

title: Why Patients Are Being Forced to Switch to a 2nd-Choice Obesity Drug
description: CVS Caremark decided to stop offering Zepbound in favor of Wegovy for weight loss. It’s the latest example of limits imposed by insurance that disrupt treatments for patients.

title: How a Sheep-Herding Cardiologist Spends His Sundays
description: Dr. David Slotwiner de-stresses from a busy week at his Queens hospital by escaping to a New Jersey farm to herd sheep with his Border collies.

title: What to Know About the Hepatitis A Outbreak in L.A. County
description: A highly contagious liver infection is surging among groups who are not typically at risk. At least seven people have died.

title: Local Officials Brace for Loss of Disaster Preparedness Funding
description: The C.D.C. delivered $750 million annually to state and local health departments for emergency work. The program was eliminated in the Trump administration’s budget blueprint.

title: The $200 Billion Gamble: Bill Gates’s Plan to Wind Down His Foundation
description: In a wide-ranging interview, he explains his decision — amid the Trump administration’s assault on foreign aid — to accelerate the end of his giving.

title: Readers reply: If you were prepping, what would your top five items be?
description: The long-running series in which readers answer other readers’ questions on subjects ranging from trivial flights of fancy to profound scientific and philosophical concepts. This week’s followed the Spain/Portugal outages

title: Houseplant clinic: why does my kalanchoe have a powdery coating?

title: My wife has decided she’s done with sex – could it be the menopause?
description: After eight years together, she says she loves me and there is no one else. But she can’t tell me why she no longer wants to be intimate. I am afraid this will end our marriage

title: Welsh thatching and ship figurehead carving added to UK crafts red list
description: Number of traditional skills considered critically endangered jumps to 72 but other crafts are making a comeback

title: Is it true that … ginger shots boost immunity?

title: Dining across the divide: ‘I was expecting her to shout me down’

title: ‘I lost so much weight, my husband thought I was terminally ill’: why do people lie about taking Ozempic?

description: There’s a gap between what you want to do and what you do, advice columnist Eleanor Gordon-Smith writes. Thinking about how it affects others might help

title: It took five minutes of practice a day to make me a guitarist | Letter
description: Letter: Matthew Butte on how taking small steps to do something can be transformational

title: The aristocrat diet: why do posh people eat such beige, bland, boring food?
description: They like ice-cream – but only homemade. Carrots – but only served whole. And don’t even think of cooking with any herb or spice livelier than parsley ...
